name: BHARATIYA KHEL UTTHAN TRUST
briefDescription: The Bharatiya Khel Utthan Trust is conducting the tournaments, cultures & welfare programs to promote the grass roots players and children at the World level. We want to develop the interest of public in sports in every possible way and to promote amateurism among players and to take following steps for promoting, spreading and popularizing the various sports including cricket, athletics, kabaddi, football, swimming, gymnastics, badminton, table tennis, lawn tennis, golf, martial arts and all other sports recognized by the Government of India. Three times cricket tournament has already organized under the name of Kundan Cricket, now this time we came on grand level.We are running a campaign for Health Services, Education, Culture Programs
